headline: Akamai’s CIO pilots AI, but isn’t often sold on full adoption, due to worries about costs and technology maturity
summary: Akamai Technologies CIO Kate Prouty says the company's workers have a voracious appetite for AI. But she isn't yet completely sold on the technology's promised benefits.

raw.headline: Akamai’s CIO pilots AI, but isn’t often sold on full adoption, due to worries about costs and technology maturity
